content.text:
# Divine Revolution

Divine Revolution is the first studio album by Russian metal band Dominia.
Track listing
Personnel
* Anton Rosa − vocals
* Casper – violin, keyboards
* Kat − violin
* Daniel – guitar
* Papa − drums
* Alexander Goodwin – bass
Sources
* [https://www.rockhard.de/reviews/dominia-divine-revolution_313809.html Review] by Rock Hard
